HelpXML.Title: HYPpsix
HelpXML.Purpose: HYPpsix computes psi function for hyperbolic tangent estimator times x

Item.Name: u
Item.LongDesc: n x 1 vector containing residuals or Mahalanobis distances for the n units of the sample

Item.Name: cktuning
Item.TypeInd: Vector of length 2 or of length 5

Item.Name: psiHYPx
Item.LongDesc: n x 1 vector which contains the values of hyperbolic psi(u)*u function associated to the residuals or Mahalanobis distances for the n units of the sample.

HelpXML.MoreAbout:
Function HYPpsix transforms vector $u$ as follows
\[ HYPpsix(u) = \left\{ \begin{array}{cc} u^2 & |u| \leq d \\
\sqrt{A (k - 1)} \tanh \left( \sqrt{(k - 1) B^2/A} (c -|u|)/2 \right) sign(u) u & d \leq |u| < c, \\ 0 & |u| \geq c. \end{array} \right. \] It is necessary to have $0 < A < B < 2 normcdf(c)-1- 2 c normpdf(c) <1$

References.Item: Frank R. Hampel, Peter J. Rousseeuw and Elvezio Ronchetti (1981), The Change-of-Variance Curve and Optimal Redescending M-Estimators, Journal of the American Statistical Association , Vol. 76, No. 375, pp. 643-648 (HRR)

Item.Title: plot of psi(x)*x for Hyperbolic estimator.
